description: As time moves forward, Rico Marlon’s lust for other men combines with his desire to see his lover, Allen King, used like a piece of meat. Allen is unsure at first, but when Rico flippantly invites his fuck pals Edji Da Silva and Arad Winwin over to work out in the sun room, Allen’s meek attitude fades away and he turns into a total suck-and-fuck pig. Rico lets Edji and Arad have all the fun they want with Allen King, treating him like a little slut the entire time!
title: Arad Winwin, Rico Marlon, And Edji Da Silva Pass Around Allen King
